Package it.cnr.isti.thematrix.configuration

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigChecker  
    ConfigSingleton
    The TheMatrix configuration file (singleton), supports reading in the file-based configuration and act upon it.
    Dynamic
    This class is here to hold dynamically generated configuration information that we want to treat more or less like a singleton.
    LogST
    Class to hold all the logging related stuff inside TheMatrix.
    MappingSingleton
    The TheMatrix LIAD to IAD mapping file.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Dynamic.selectedIADVersion
    Enable use of the full schema definition for IAD tables, possibly new revisions.
